title: Is removing impurity (najasah) wajib?
body:
removing impurity is wajib by ʾIjmāʿ and the ʾIjmāʿ was stated by

ʾIbn Ḥazm (Al-muhhalla 3/70)

ʾIbn ‘Abd al-bar (al-tamhid 22/242)

Ḥanīfi madhab (tabieen al-haqa’aq 1/69)

Shāfiʿī madhab (majmu’ al-nawawai 2/599)

one of the opinions of the Māliki madhab

(muwahib al-jalil 1/188)

Ḥanbali madhab (al-mughni 2/48)
author: ʿAlī
